faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change plans at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. The change will take effect on your next billing cycle.
faq.q2: Do you offer discounts for annual subscriptions?
faq.a2: Yes, by choosing an annual subscription, you get two months free (that's 17% off).
faq.q3: How does the free trial work?
faq.a3: Our free trials last 30 days and give you access to all features of the chosen plan. No credit card is required for the trial.
faq.a4: No, our pricing is transparent. There are no hidden or additional fees.

seo.title: About | Gifters
seo.description: Discover the story of Gifters, our mission and our dedicated team.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Gifters was born from a personal experience: the difficulty of organizing group gifts without duplicates or forgetting anyone.
ourStory.paragraph2: Launched in 2025, our platform aims to simplify gift coordination for birthdays, holidays and special occasions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Facilitate group gift organization so that every occasion is memorable without the stress of logistical details.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that generosity should be simple and enjoyable, free from administrative and financial constraints.

team.title: Our Team
team.paragraph1: We are a passionate team of entrepreneurs and developers sharing the same vision: making celebrations more joyful and less stressful.
team.paragraph2: Our diversity is our strength - different profiles united by the desire to create a useful everyday solution.

values.title: Our Values
values.paragraph1: Simplicity, transparency and friendliness are at the heart of our approach.
values.paragraph2: We develop Gifters with a constant concern for user experience and personal data protection.
